inclusion.criterion: Understand and voluntarily sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age ≥18 years at the time of signing the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to adhere to the study visit schedule and other protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Relapsed / Refractory Multiple Myeloma following at least two prior standard therapies including lenalidomide
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be refractory to prior lenalidomide therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must have measurable disease defined as one or more of the following criteria:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum monoclonal protein greater than 10 g/L
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Serum immunoglobulin free light chain (FLC) more than 10 mg/dL and an abnormal FLC ratio
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable soft tissue plasmacytoma that has not been irradiated
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Greater than 30% plasma cells in bone marrow
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: All previous cancer therapy, including radiation, hormonal therapy and surgery, must have been discontinued at least 2 weeks prior to treatment in this study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any serious medical condition, laboratory abnormality, or psychiatric illness that would prevent the subject from signing the informed consent form
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential who are unwilling to use a dual method of contraception; and men who are unwilling to use a condom
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease, systemic amyloidosis, and is on hemodialysis. She has received various treatments including melphalan, prednisone, VAD regimen, autologous stem cell transplant, thalidomide, and velcade.
